title: Business Administration Mentoring and Experiential Learning Program for Practical Competency Development

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Intensive program for undergraduates aiming for professional careers, focusing on practical competency development with digital devices and online collaboration tools.

learning_goals: Students can acquire and evaluate at least three practical skills required in industrial settings (e.g., investment analysis, project management).
Students can analyze real business cases and propose actionable solutions through collaboration with mentors.
Students can complete team projects using digital collaboration tools and produce presentation materials.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
